text:
[Verse]
Sunshine morning light
Warmth of golden glow
Wake up feelin' bright
In the love we know

[Verse 2]
Moonlight in the sky
Stars they start to show
Dance beneath the high
In a dream we go

[Chorus]
Sunshine and moonlight
Day and night we blend
Hold me in the night
Till the daylight bends

[Verse 3]
Morning comes and goes
Time it seems to fly
In this love it grows
Lift it to the sky

[Bridge]
Sun and stars align
Hearts beat in the same
In your eyes I shine
Warmth and love remain

[Chorus]
Sunshine and moonlight
Day and night we blend
Hold me in the night
Till the daylight bends
title: Sunshine and Moonlight
